abstract: Fresenius Medical Care, world's biggest kidney dialysis equipment maker, agrees to pay $250 million to settle over 10,000 lawsuits filed by dialysis patients and their relatives claiming firm's products had caused heart problems and deaths.

headline.print_headline: World’s Largest Dialysis Equipment Maker Agrees to Settle a Lawsuit for $250 Million
headline.main: Dialysis Equipment Maker Settles Lawsuit for $250 Million

keywords.value: Fresenius Medical Care AG & Company KGaA
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Dialysis products from Fresenius Medical Care are said to have caused an increase in deaths from cardiac arrest.
lead_paragraph: Dialysis products from Fresenius Medical Care are said to have caused an increase in deaths from cardiac arrest.
